name: Beat Factory
description:
Beat Factory

A rhythm game where you tap to the beat of various songs to clear levels.

Featuring 20 unique songs ranging from relaxing melodies to complex challenging compositions.

Get into the rhythm and tap your way across songs to collect all the stars and become the employee of the month in the Beat Factory!

For any feedback, questions problems, you can leave a comment or write to neebloostudios@gmail.com.

*If you like the game,  you can show your support with a donation, cheers!*
